title: Elegant Kundan and Pearl Nakshi Haaram Set with Matching Earrings
materials: Freshwater Pearls. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: Intricately handcrafted Nakshi work pendant featuring traditional peacock motifs. Exquisite Kundan stone arrangement highlighting ruby and emerald simulants. The necklace is delicately strung with dangling pearls. The matching Jhumka earrings echo the pendant's design, creating a cohesive and elegant look.
occasions: festive occasions like Diwali and Dussehra
and grand celebrations. Suitable for both traditional Telugu ceremonies and sophisticated modern events.
description: This Haaram set showcases exceptional craftsmanship and timeless elegance. The traditional Nakshi work blended with the sparkling Kundan stones offers a luxurious yet classic appeal. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting brilliance. This set makes a cherished heirloom and a statement piece for any special occasion.
